text: Manuel Buendia Navarrete (born March 28, 1957 in Girona) is a skier from Spain. He has a disability: he is blind and is a type B2 skier. He raced at the 1992 Winter Paralympics in para-alpine skiing. He was the number 2 skier in the Super Giant. He raced at the 1994 Winter Paralympics in para-alpine skiing. He was the number 2 skier in the Super Giant, Giant Slalom and Slalom. He raced at the 1998 Winter Paralympics in para-alpine skiing. == References == Category:Spanish skiers Category:Living people Category:1957 births Category:Paralympic silver medalists for Spain Category:Sportspeople from Catalonia Category:1992 Winter Paralympics Category:1994 Winter Paralympics Category:1998 Winter Paralympics Category:Sportspeople with disabilities, type B2
title: Manuel Buendia Navarrete
